11211212111111121112122122.title: Follow Courtney.

choices: The girls start eating the boys food.
112112121111111211122.content:
The boys got their disgusting food and went to sit down. None of them actually ate it because just looking at it made them sick. Even Owen couldn’t stomach the stuff. They could all see the girls stuffing their faces with delicious food. After a few days, Duncan had had enough.

“Okay, that’s it, I can’t eat this junk.” Said Duncan as he pushed the food away. “Either Chris gets us better food or else we strike.”

“Yeah!” agreed the other boys.

The guys followed Duncan out of the mess hall, leaving their gross food on the table. What happens next?
112112121111111211122.title: go on strike

choices: Chris makes the guts eat twice as much gross food
Chris gives the guys better food.
1121121211111112111221.content:
As soon as the guys left, the girls finished their meals. They all rubbed their huge bellies as they digested their food. Courtney was still the fattest of them all, while Beth was the skinniest. Their clothes were getting harder to wear without stretching them. By now they were almost as fat as Owen and still hungry.

"Awww, no more food?" Lindsay asked.

“Darn it! Don’t they know we’re starving?” Heather complained.

“Well what are supposed to do now? Hey wait, where’s Izzy?” asked Courtney.

It took a second before the large ladies saw Izzy at the boys’ table eating Owen’s food.

“Ewwwww.” Beth said in disgust.

Izzy raised her head from the food and said, “What? It’s not so bad after awhile.”

Leshawna reluctantly tried some food and shrugged as she joined Izzy. After a few minutes, the girls were all eating the disgusting food, not caring how it tasted as long as they were eating. This continued for about a week until….
1121121211111112111221.title: The girls start eating the boys food.

choices: "Flirt with them and trick them into giving us their food."
11211212111111121112212.content:
All the girls on the show were as fat as Owen, if not fatter, when they heard Chris’ announcement.

“Attention campers, due to the guys’ constant, annoying strike, I have decided to reluctantly cave in and give the guys the same kind of food as the girls. Now will you please stop stealing from my secret stash!”

The guys were thrilled, but the girls weren’t as happy.

“Aw man, now we won’t be able to eat the guys’ food.” Leshawna moaned.

“Yeah, I mean Chris is feeding us a lot, but 5 meals a day isn’t enough.” Beth said.

“Okay look, it’s obvious we all want the guys’ food, but to do that we need to work together.” Said Heather. “I know we can’t stand each other, but this is our only hope.”

As much as it pained the other girls to admit it, Heather was right. They had to work together to get more food.

“So in order to get their food, we should….”
11211212111111121112212.title: Chris gives the guys better food.

Gwen can guilt Trent into giving up his food
Courtney can nag Duncan into relinquishing his meals

"It'll be easy enough; Trent is nuts for Gwen and Owen is still hung up on Izzy, not to mention Courtney has Duncan wrapped around her finger." Courtney and Gwen blushed while Izzy just grinned shamelessly.

Leshawna raised an eyebrow at Heather, "Won't the boys get suspicious when all three girls start flirting and begging for food?"

Heather scoffed and shook her head, "We don't have to do it all at once you know. We'll start off with one and soon we'll get the rest of the boys on board."

Beth asked timidly, "So... who's going to get their food first?"
